title: 'Star Wars' movie posters through the years
text: Blogs 'Star Wars' movie posters through the years On Oct. 18, 2015, the highly anticipated theatrical poster for 'Star Wars Episode VII: The Force Awakens' was finally released featuring new stars Daisy Ridley and John Boyega and old ones like Harrison Ford and Carrie Fisher. Ahead of the latest film's release, take a look back at the other movie posters from the epic saga. Photo: Lucas Film Ltd../ Published: 10/19/2015 2:12:01 'Star Wars Episode VII: The Force Awakens,' 2015 Their back! After much anticipation, the newest Star Wars movie poster has finally been released for the upcoming film "Star Wars Episode VII: The Force Awakens." The film is set to be released on Dec. 18, 2015 and stars familiar faces like Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford and Carrie Fisher. The film also introduces some new actors like Lupita Nyong'o and John Boyega. 1 of 12
